meanings.definition: A person who advocates or practices ultramodernism.
meanings.sent1: The ultramodernists gathered to discuss the latest trends in architecture.
meanings.sent2: She is known as one of the leading ultramodernists in the art world.
meanings.sent3: The ultramodernists decided to create a futuristic city made entirely of glass.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, she is a true ultramodernist, always pushing boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The ultramodernists' bold ideas revolutionized the design industry.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to ultramodernism or ultramodernists.
meanings.sent1: The ultramodernists movement influenced many young artists.
meanings.sent2: Her ultramodernists style was evident in the sleek lines of the building.
meanings.sent3: The ultramodernists decor of the room made it feel like a space-age lounge.
meanings.sent4: His ultramodernists approach to technology was ahead of its time.
meanings.sent5: The ultramodernists design of the car was both functional and stylish.
